## Notes

### For Cross-Repo ADRs (in td-meta)

- Use sequential numbering: 001, 002, etc.
- Coordinate changes with affected repositories
- Consider impact across all td-* repos

### For Repo-Specific ADRs

- Use your repository's numbering sequence
- Focus on decisions internal to your repo
- Link to cross-repo ADRs when relevant
